label: specifiedPaymentMeans
comment: The means by which a payment will be or has been made for trade settlement purposes.

rangeIncludes.comment: The means by which a payment will be or has been made for trade settlement purposes.

domainIncludes.comment: The information, at a header level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction, with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, such as a commercial invoice.
The information that enables the reconciliation of a payment with the item(s) that the payment is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.
A charge made for a logistics related service.
The information, at a header level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction, with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, such as a commercial invoice.
